Night Shift na=
rrows his eyes. He was caught but he still had a small ace in the hole. He =
remembers the finger darts in his left hand, and quickly points the finger =
darts at a pair of eyes on Hydras's dragon head. Small as they were, they c=
ould still sting like crazy. He was a pretty sharp shooter with the finger =
darts, which happened to be one of his most favorite weapons. He lets two d=
arts fire, and also saves a couple for Scorponok's eyes as well, with a bit=
 of fancy rapid firing.

" Not if I can help it."

At the same time, he ope=
ns his com link to Lord Elder. Like Tucson he could pull many surprises, bu=
t his were more in the form of surprise on board weaponry.
